home.content-primary-card: Passionate and creative web developer with experience in impactful projects. I translate ideas into efficient code to create engaging and functional digital experiences. Explore my portfolio!

about.title: ABOUT ME
about.content:
My name is Luis, and I'm from Argentina. I'm currently seeking my first job as a software developer. I specialize in web development, particularly in frontend, although I also have knowledge in backend and can navigate both areas. 

In mid-2022, I discovered this beautiful world of programming, and since then, I've completed several projects that have helped shape my skills as a programmer. I always strive to find the most effective and straightforward solutions to problems. The technologies I enjoy working with the most are HTML, CSS, and React. 

I consider myself a highly committed and dedicated individual. Thanks to this commitment, I proudly obtained a tertiary degree in business administration and completed an intensive course as a full-stack developer, all while working in a different field and juggling other responsibilities. However, my passion for learning is far from over. I am an eternal learner, seeking continuous professional growth, eager to nurture my knowledge, and ready to contribute my ideas and skills to achieve any set objectives.
about.developer: As a developer, I aim to create efficient and straightforward solutions. I focus on writing clean, maintainable code, adhering to best practices. I strive to stay updated with new updates and technologies.
about.design-ux/ui: I focus on creating intuitive and visually appealing interfaces to enhance user experience and satisfaction.
about.ecommerse: I'm passionate about crafting secure and engaging platforms to boost online businesses with efficient functionalities, aiming to enhance the user's shopping experience.

contact.title: CONTACT
contact.subtitle: READY TO TAKE YOUR IDEAS TO THE WEB ?
contact.content: I'm here to assist you. If you're interested in my services and would like us to collaborate, get a 15% discount for new clients. If you have any suggestions or questions, feel free to reach out to me on my social media.
